periods.name: Today
periods.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Slight Chance Rain Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 1pm. Partly sunny. High near 82, with temperatures falling to around 80 in the afternoon. East northeast wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Tonight
